parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>A3</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mines

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes ownership of all owned mines/explosive devices of the given unit

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''removeAllOwnedMines''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllOwnedMines]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allMines]], [[createMine]], [[detectedMines]], [[mineActive]], [[removeOwnedMine]], [[addOwnedMine]]
</value></part></template>
